const response = await client.search({
  index: "news",
  query: {
    match: {
      custom_all: "elasticsearch",
    },
  },
  aggs: {
    tags: {
      significant_text: {
        field: "custom_all",
        source_fields: ["content", "title"],
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);
